name: T-Temple
description:
Move: Arrows or WASD
Jump: Z or L

I though i would have time to make all the stuff i imagine for this game, but i didn't. I wanted to make 5 'zones', each one with a different tetris piece to collect at the end, but i made only one. So it's doesn't have much content, and you can finish it really quick!

This game was made using the engine i'm making on top of luxe engine, it's the same engine i'm using for Super 365 Quest and N°7. I was thinking about turn this game into a shooter or something cool, but it dependes on the support since i'm already working in two game.

The music, programming, art and everything was made by me. It's a really small game, but i hope you enjoy it!

Thanks! :)
